description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nCamaraderie:
After this creature {ACTION_defends}, it gains a {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} that absorbs damage equal to 100% of its Maximum {STAT_health}. If this creature already has a {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER}, it gives it to a random ally instead.
name: Gummy Egg
